entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 3:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
